generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Scatter Params World
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Controls the scatter distribution of a particular object.

fields.title: z
fields.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

fields.title: Random Distribution Type
fields.description: Type of distribution. Supported distributions are defined by "Random Distribution Type".

fields.title: extent
fields.description: Lower and upper bound (inclusive) of the scatter range, as an offset from the input point to scatter around.

fields.title: step_size
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the distance between steps along this axis.

fields.title: grid_offset
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the offset along this axis.

fields.title: iterations
fields.description: Number of scattered positions to generate.

fields.title: expression
fields.description: expression

fields.title: version
fields.description: version

fields.title: scatter_chance
fields.description: Probability that this scatter will occur. Not evaluated each iteration; either no iterations will run, or all will.

fields.title: numerator
fields.description: Numerator for scatter probability.

fields.title: denominator
fields.description: Denominator for scatter probability.

fields.title: Coordinate Evaluation Order
fields.description: The order in which coordinates will be evaluated. Should be used when a coordinate depends on another. If omitted, defaults to "xzy". Supported orders are defined by "Coordinate Evaluation Order".

fields.title: x
fields.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

fields.title: Random Distribution Type
fields.description: Type of distribution. Supported distributions are defined by "Random Distribution Type".

fields.title: extent
fields.description: Lower and upper bound (inclusive) of the scatter range, as an offset from the input point to scatter around.

fields.title: step_size
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the distance between steps along this axis.

fields.title: grid_offset
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the offset along this axis.

fields.title: y
fields.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

fields.title: Random Distribution Type
fields.description: Type of distribution. Supported distributions are defined by "Random Distribution Type".

fields.title: extent
fields.description: Lower and upper bound (inclusive) of the scatter range, as an offset from the input point to scatter around.

fields.title: step_size
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the distance between steps along this axis.

fields.title: grid_offset
fields.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the offset along this axis.
